TopicTitle: Fastest Runway To Island To Runway.

Articles.Content:
\*Please be nit-picky here. If it's unclear, tell me\*

Challenge: Build a single engined, single wing aircraft capable of getting to the island runway, taxiing to the second hangar, taking off from the first hangar and landing on the KSC runway the direction you started.

Size of the plane doesn't matter. Time and regulations do.

Here's The Catch: You cannot have horizontal wings apart from the main wing, and only up to 2 vertical fins, with or without a control surface, up to 2 degrees of rotation. The main wing can be made of as many wings as you want, but only up to 2 control surfaces.

Medals:

JebAlike - Under 1 minute and 30 seconds (Jeb difficulty) (if too hard with landing, fly through hangars)

Platinum - Under 5 minutes 30 seconds (very hard)

Gold - Under 7 minutes

Silver - Under 9 minutes

Bronze - Under 12 minutes

-BadS - Any of the ones above without wheel brakes and under 25 units of fuel.

-FlightATron - Fly through the hangars instead.

-Unique Design - A design that doesn't exactly look fit for the task it was built for ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Epic design award - Awarded to those by popular vote who have an epic looking craft.

I have gotten my time down:

T+6:15 on the clock.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YxGW43O1kkg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The HyperEdit button in the top right was there only because I was testing a mod I'm developing.

Top times so far:

Aphobius - 1:46 Platinum, FlightATron (parachute landing)

Nanobit - 1:52 Platinum, FlightATron (parachute landing)

Xannari Ferrows - 2:40 - Platinum, FlightATron (parachute landing)

klesh - 2:59 - Platinum, Unique Design

t3hJimmer - 3:34 - Platinum

Triop - 5:21 (Incorrect Landing) - Platinum

Avetho (Me) - 6:15 - Gold, BadS

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T22:00:43Z" title="06/20/2015 10:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by Avetho**

Nice run Trio, your first plane looks a lot cooler tho ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I think you're supposed to land on the KSC runway from the other direction. Can you clarify Avetho? Also, I hate to be nit-picky, but are those tail planes okay? From the OP I was under the impression you couldn't have them angled like that, they were supposed to be mostly straight up and down.

Anyway, this is my submission:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/goIFJ-kmCS8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Challenge Stats:**

Time: **5:34**

**Aircraft Specs:**

name: "I cant X-plane"

parts: 19

weight: 7.2 t

length: 9.8 m

wingspan: 9.9 m

[http://pastebin.com/J9qfz0a9](http://pastebin.com/J9qfz0a9)

t3hJimmer yeah the landing. Lol. Oh, and what I mean by no elavators is, well, you know most planes have 4 major horizontal wing surfaces, like the 2 large wings, and the small tail wings at the back? The ones at the back aren't allowed here. Something like a delta wing design works well here.

- - - Updated - - -

t3hJimmer oh yes, I was replying before 6 but my internet dropped until like 10 minutes ago. The back control surfaces I hate to say are illegal, but I'd say the vertical control surfaces are ok. My plane had them like that too.

Edit: And as well, that plane looks fast. Were you going for the Platinum here as well? I went for the basic turbojet for the BadS medal.

Edit 2: Saw the end, that landing was clutch right? I was like: "No, he's going for another pass? No, he's not, but he might not make it! Yess! He made it." Very close landing. About 50m from the end.

Edit 3: I have updated the challenge description. Thanks for being nit-picky. I wouldn't have clarified otherwise ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-21T04:00:37Z" title="06/21/2015 04:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 21, 2015</time> by Triop**

> 
> In the video @ 1:45 You bumbed and corrected in a strange way.....did you use mods ?

If you look close you can see I have 2 reaction wheels stacked at the back of the plane. They are strong enough to turn the plane even when its not rolling forward. 

Cheap? Yes. Cheating, I don't think so. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Why limit it to deltas? That doesn't add to the creativity required, it just limits the design possibilities.

Wanderfound I'm not limiting the wings to deltas, it was just a suggestion because they don't need the separate elevators at the back of the craft.

- - - Updated - - -

t3hJimmer yeah, it isn't cheating. It is still well within the regulations that have been set.

How did your control surfaces not brutally explode at 900 m/s because when my planes fly at those speeds in those altitudes the control surfaces explode/fall off

I just completed this on stream in 2:12, but i'm not sure if i managed to save the recording or not...

I decided to make an account just to post about this tbh.

EDIT 1:

Got one at 2:16, though my landing wasn't quite as good cause I hit it early..

Stream doesn't appear to be saving videos correctly, so i'll just record it like a normal person I guess.

EDIT 2:

Got 2:12 Successfully recorded.

Craft name: TurboJetTest Mk.2 (Not creative, I was testing designs and got excited with this one working and forgot to rename it, ahaha.)

You may notice it's a similar design to Aphobius's design, I didn't use that for design influence at all, it just sorta turned out that way. Probably because it's hard to improve it much further than that for this challenge. However I could have used ~50 less units of fuel (~150 Total), and probably could have flown much better. Wheels? We don't need those. Hopefully this still counts as landing in the same direction I took off from, since it is. Technically.

Ignore my talking, I did this on [stream](http://connectcast.tv/Nanobit). c:

Mods Installed, but none that are illegal to use for this challenge.

Craft Specs:

![iJNcW.png](http://puu.sh/iJNcW.png)

Moderation note: video includes a bit of swearing. Do not click on it if that sort of thing offends you. 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1HC1ti6F58g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Max temp turns out to be 2389K (Did I cut that close enough?)

EDIT 3:

Apparently the videos I did first (from the same stream, but that I had trouble with before) ARE saving now, it's just taking a very long time for them to post.

They're at my channel (linked above under edit 2), under the videos tab if you want to watch my design process and failures.

At one point I DID have RCS on the craft, but they're not on the Mk.2 (The one i recorded and entered)

Looks like we both had nearly the same idea, nice job! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That was very fast Nanobit, and we had our first speech in this thread ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Although you didn't land the direction you took off, but rather turned that way on landing, that was an amazing run ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Marking down 2:12 right now.

And Xannari, that was cool to see, both of you didn't land to taxi around the hangars, but rather you both flew through them, a very hard thing to do, so I'm going to make a new secondary medal to go under the BadS one ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
You know what? I'm giving this another go, I can do better. Going for a new addition of the Sky Arrow Mini with this one...

322997am what version were you using? When we did our runs I'm pretty sure 1.0.2 was the latest. It was for me.

Good luck Xannari ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
